title: `<module:Expectations>': undefined method `infect_an_assertion' for module Minitest::Expectations (NoMethodError) with Minitest 5.25.3
body:
Managed to reproduce CI failure at https://buildkite.com/rails/rails-nightly/builds/1409#01938e54-1a71-471d-a76d-12d038c0be02/1239-1243 

### Steps to reproduce

```ruby
git clone https://github.com/rails/rails
cd rails/activesupport
bundle update minitest --conservative
bin/test
```

### Expected behavior
It should pass.

### Actual behavior
It raises "`<module:Expectations>': undefined method `infect_an_assertion' for module Minitest::Expectations (NoMethodError)"
